snippet: Rick Santorum is slumping in many polls of the 10 states that will vote on Super Tuesday, but especially in Ohio, where Mitt Romney is now the 2-to-1 favorite to win the primary.
abstract: Rick Santorum is slumping in many polls of the 10 states that will vote on Super Tuesday, but especially in Ohio, where Mitt Romney is now the 2-to-1 favorite to win the primary.

headline.main: Santorum Slumps in Super Tuesday Polls
